channel.title: Server running error
channel.description:
Hello, Im trying to run server on VPS (Linux CentOs 5.2) through UltraVNC (Gnome Desktop) Server is 474
And then i try to [code][root@x42 serv]# sh run.sh[/code] I get this: [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: ./data/cfg/prices.txt (No such file or directory) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:137) at java.util.Scanner.<init>(Scanner.java:653) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:308) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:59) ./Data/CFG/npc.cfg: file not found. ./Data/CFG/spawn-config.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. Raredrop: 0 11712 Raredrop: 0 1 Raredrop: 1 11728 Raredrop: 1 1 Raredrop: 2 11714 Raredrop: 2 1 Raredrop: 3 11724 Raredrop: 3 1 Raredrop: 4 11704 Raredrop: 4 1 Raredrop: 5 11710 Raredrop: 5 1 But problem is this: [code]java.io.FileNotFoundException: ./data/cfg/prices.txt (No such file or directory) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:137) at java.util.Scanner.<init>(Scanner.java:653) at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemPrices(ItemHandler.java:308) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:59) ./Data/CFG/npc.cfg: file not found. ./Data/CFG/spawn-config.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. Then i log in to the server there is no shops & no npc.
Some1 can help me? Please All cfg files is /serv/Data/cfg
